headline.main: The Art of Getting Opponents to “We”

docs.abstract: Lessons learned in conflict resolution are helping once-implacable opponents on social issues like education, nourishing food and health care find common ground.
docs.snippet: Lessons learned in conflict resolution are helping once-implacable opponents on social issues like education, nourishing food and health care find common ground.

docs.lead_paragraph: Kentucky voters have elected just the second Republican in four decades to hold the governor's office, in a race that hinged largely on President Barack Obama's signature legislation, the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: GOP Wins Kentucky Governor's Race in Top State Election
headline.print_headline: GOP Wins Kentucky Governor's Race in Top State Election

docs.snippet: Kentucky voters have elected just the second Republican in four decades to hold the governor's office, in a race that hinged largely on President Barack Obama's signature legislation, the Affordable Care Act.

docs.lead_paragraph: Corrections appearing in print on Tuesday, November 3, 2015.
docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on Tuesday, November 3, 2015.

docs.lead_paragraph: A once expansive vision has shrunk to mean self-interest.
docs.abstract: Pamela Druckerman Op-Ed article observes with dismay French reluctance to accept refugees flooding Continent; contrasts current mood with welcome France gave to refugees from Laos, Vietnam and Cambodia in 1970s; notes fact that refugees are Muslim is important factor.
docs.snippet: A once expansive vision has shrunk to mean self-interest.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

docs.lead_paragraph: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc sought to reassure doctors on Monday that the company's decision to cut ties to a controversial specialty pharmacy would not disrupt doctors' ability to prescribe the company's drugs to patients.

headline.main: Valeant Sends Letter to Doctors, Seeks to Reassure Over Pharmacy Ties
headline.print_headline: Valeant Sends Letter to Doctors, Seeks to Reassure Over Pharmacy Ties

docs.snippet: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc sought to reassure doctors on Monday that the company's decision to cut ties to a controversial specialty pharmacy would not disrupt doctors' ability to prescribe the company's drugs to patients.

docs.lead_paragraph: An Illinois judge said on Monday he will rule no later than Dec. 11 on motions by Chicago and its four pension funds to dismiss a lawsuit that could greatly increase the cash-strapped city's retiree healthcare costs.

headline.main: Dismissal of Chicago Retiree Healthcare Lawsuit in Hands of Judge
headline.print_headline: Dismissal of Chicago Retiree Healthcare Lawsuit in Hands of Judge

docs.snippet: An Illinois judge said on Monday he will rule no later than Dec. 11 on motions by Chicago and its four pension funds to dismiss a lawsuit that could greatly increase the cash-strapped city's retiree healthcare costs.

docs.lead_paragraph: The push to put California among the states where marijuana can be sold to and legally used by adults for recreation took a major step forward on Monday as ballot language backed by Napster co-founder Sean Parker, other wealthy entrepreneurs who support pot legalization and leading advocacy groups was filed with the state.

headline.main: Tech Tycoon Spearheads Pot Legalization Bid in California
headline.print_headline: Tech Tycoon Spearheads Pot Legalization Bid in California

headline.main: Should Same-Sex Couples Receive Fertility Benefits?

docs.abstract: Many insurance companies that cover infertility treatments for heterosexual couples will not reimburse treatment costs for same-sex couples.
docs.snippet: Many insurance companies that cover infertility treatments for heterosexual couples will not reimburse treatment costs for same-sex couples.

docs.lead_paragraph: Kentucky residents vote Tuesday on a successor to Democratic Governor Steve Beshear as county clerk Kim Davis' refusal to issue marriage licenses to gay couples has put the state in the national spotlight.

headline.main: Democrat Favored in Kentucky Governor's Race Amid Focus on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Democrat Favored in Kentucky Governor's Race Amid Focus on Gay Marriage

docs.snippet: Kentucky residents vote Tuesday on a successor to Democratic Governor Steve Beshear as county clerk Kim Davis' refusal to issue marriage licenses to gay couples has put the state in the national spotlight.

docs.lead_paragraph: In most states, the big elections will come next year. But on Tuesday, voters in a few states elected governors and legislators, some cities selected mayors, and a variety of major issues were being settled at the ballot box.

headline.main: AP News Guide: Key Races and Issues in Tuesday's Elections
headline.print_headline: AP News Guide: Key Races and Issues in Tuesday's Elections

docs.snippet: In most states, the big elections will come next year. But on Tuesday, voters in a few states elected governors and legislators, some cities selected mayors, and a variety of major issues were being settled at the ballot box.
